summary: The arrival of a new student in school changes Leonardo's life. This 15 year-old blind teenager has to deal with the jealousy of his friend Giovana while figuring out the new feelings he's having towards his new friend, Gabriel.
cast: Ghilherme Lobo|Tess Amorim|Fabio Audi|Nora Toledo|Julio Machado|Carolina Cezar Respanti
keywords: new student|blind teenager|gay teenager|gay friend|teenage boy
